name: Margi Boutique Hotel
description:
Looking for a place to stay in Hyderabad? Then look no further than Margi Boutique Hotel, a boutique boutique hotel that brings the best of Hyderabad to your doorstep.
Rooms at Margi Boutique Hotel provide air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free wifi.
In addition, while staying at Margi Boutique Hotel guests have access to room service. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Margi Boutique Hotel.
Nearby landmarks such as Shri Jagannath Temple (1.5 mi) and Hyderabadmyway.com (1.5 mi) make Margi Boutique Hotel a great place to stay when visiting Hyderabad.
If you like Mediterranean restaurants, Margi Boutique Hotel is conveniently located near Olive Bistro, Mandi @ 36 Arabian Kitchen, and Spice 6 The Global Cuisine.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out KLN Yadav Park (0.9 mi), Jalagam Vengal Rao Park (0.8 mi), or Krishna Kanth Park (0.6 mi), which are popular attractions amongst tourists, and they are all within walking distance.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Margi Boutique Hotel as you experience everything Hyderabad has to offer.

name: Hotel Shubham Palace
description:
Hotel Shubham Palace is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Hyderabad, offering many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Guest rooms offer air conditioning, and Hotel Shubham Palace makes getting online easy as free wifi is available.
You can also take advantage of some of the amenities offered by the inn, including a 24 hour front desk. In addition, guests can enjoy an on-site restaurant during their visit. As an added convenience, there is free parking available to guests.
While staying at Hotel Shubham Palace, visitors can check out Paigah Tombs (1.3 mi) and Shri Shirdi Sai Baba Temple (1.3 mi), some of Hyderabad's top attractions.
While in Hyderabad, you may want to check out some of the restaurants that are a short walk away from Hotel Shubham Palace, including Paradise (0.6 mi), Coco's Bar & Grill (0.8 mi), and Lucky Restaurant (1.2 mi).
If you are interested in exploring Hyderabad, check out some of the nearby attractions, such as Karmanghat Hanuman Temple (0.3 mi), HUDA Park (1.2 mi), and Eton Temple Convent School (0.8 mi), all of which are within walking distance of Hotel Shubham Palace.
Enjoy your stay in Hyderabad!

name: Hotel SVM Grand
description:
Welcome to Hotel Sitara Royal, your Hyderabad “home away from home.” Hotel Sitara Royal aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.
Nearby landmarks such as Shyam Mandir (1.4 mi) and Birla Mandir (1.5 mi) make Hotel Sitara Royal a great place to stay when visiting Hyderabad.
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Hotel Sitara Royal offer air conditioning, a minibar, and a kitchenette.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including a 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge. Guests of Hotel Sitara Royal are also welcome to enjoy an on-site restaurant. For travelers arriving by car, there is free private parking available nearby.
Hyderabad has plenty of Chinese restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Sri Saravana Bhavan, Thrupti Veg, and Golden Dragon - Taj Krishna, which are serving up some great dishes.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than ISKCON Hyderabad Sri Sri Radha Madanmohan Mandir (0.6 mi), Ashta Lakshmi Temple (0.6 mi), and St. Josephs Cathedral (0.9 mi), which are some popular Hyderabad attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the small hotel.
Hotel Sitara Royal puts the best of Hyderabad at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.

See why so many travelers make Taramati Baradari their small hotel of choice when visiting Hyderabad. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Nearby landmarks such as Golconda Fort (1.6 mi) and Qutab Shahi Tombs (1.6 mi) make Taramati Baradari a great place to stay when visiting Hyderabad.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a refrigerator and air conditioning.
Taramati Baradari features room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a pool and an on-site restaurant. If you are driving to Taramati Baradari, free parking is available.
While you’re here, be sure to check out Cafe Sandwicho (0.4 mi), a popular restaurant that is within walking distance of Taramati Baradari.
Plus, during your trip, don't forget to check out a science museum, such as Birla Science Center.

name: Bloom Hotel - HITEC City
description: About Bloom Hotel- HITEC City Bloom Hotel - HITEC City is located in the commercial hub of Hyderabad, a 40-minute drive from the airport. The property has a modern and trendy ambiance and has fully air-conditioned rooms. Our rooms have cloudbeds, which ensure sound sleep, and private washrooms with Grohe rain showers so that you have all you need to relax after a long and tiring day. Why choose Bloom when in Hyderabad? From spotless and spacious rooms to iMac stations and coworking spaces, you name it, Bloom Hotel - HITECH City has it. While staying in Bloom, you can expect: Hassle-free check-in and check-out Comfortable stay in crisp, clean, and trendy rooms Polite staff ready to serve you 24X7 24X7 high-speed uninterrupted Wi-Fi An in-house restaurant that serves scrumptious meals. 24X7 car rental and limited parking services Believe us, you can avail all of these services without burning a hole in your pocket. Stay with us and make good memories with Bloom Hotel - HITECH City. Where to hop around Bloom Hotel - HITECH City? The property is located in a tech industry hub and is near to HITECH City metro station which is 5 minutes away from the property. Nampally Railway Station is also a 30 minutes drive from Bloom Hotel- HITECH City. Being located in the center of the city, it is easy for guests to explore the city's major attractions. Some of the must-visit places are: Charminar (60 Mins/21 Kms) Golconda Fort (30 Mins/11 Kms) Shilparamam Crafts Village Bloom Hotel- HITECH City is perfect for all types of travelers. No matter who you are, a business, corporate, leisure, or solo traveler, Bloom Hotel - HITECH City checkmarks the list of every type of traveler. Book your stay now!

Typically each of The Purple Leaf Hotels has 40-50 spacious rooms set against a backdrop of unerring urban style and sophistication. The understated elegance brightened with young and fresh colours sets the mood of this hip hotel.

The hotel has carved a niche for itself in the business of hospitality for the breathtaking personalized services and facilities it provides to its clients and well wishers. Hotel is easy to reach, just 10mints drive from Secunderabad railway station, central bus station and 40mnts drive from international airport (RGIA). Hotel thoughtfully designed to cater to needs of Business & Budgeted Travelers, Honeymoon & Package Tour Travelers, offers Round the Clock services such as Reception, Bell Desk, Telephone, Internet with Wi-Fi access, Television with Satellite connectivity, Room Service, Travel Desk, Business Center, same day Laundry service, Valet Parking, In Room Lockers, Mini Fridge & Tea Coffee in Deluxe & Premium room, Doctor On Call, Exclusive Vegetarian Restaurant and Many more to add…

name: Hotel Padmini
description: Located in the heart of Hyderabad, Hotel Padmini Residency is your ticket to everything Hyderabad has to offer. With the Airport located 18 kilometres away, the Hyderabad Railway Station located 2 kilometres away and all major attractions just a short drive away, Hotel Padmini Residency is conveniently located for you to experience Hyderabad in all its glory through Tank Bund, Shahi Masjid, Panjagutta, Abids, Assembly & Secretariat, Jalavihar, Birla Science Centre, Archival Museum, Village Museum, Shilparamam. After all of the sight seeing, you're bound to feel hungry check out famous restaurants like Bawarchi, Barbeque Nation, Paradise Restaurant located just a walk away from the hotel. Everything in the four-storeyed hotel is designed keeping one thing in mind that the guests' comfort comes first, which is why they have elevators, laundry facilities, complimentary parking, card payment facilities, public washrooms, private cab facilities, round the clock front desk and room service. They also have a banquet hall for guests to host and attend all kinds of events, both personal and professional, as well as a pool table for guests to unwind and meet new people. The restaurant offers a cozy dining space and delectable fare which one simply cannot miss out on.

name: Park Hyatt Hyderabad
description: Park Hyatt Hyderabad is one of the most luxurious 5 star hotels in Hyderabad. With opulent architecture and unparalleled service, it’s not a stay but a journey that unfolds into rare and intimate experiences. Enjoy stunning art in the hotel, sumptuous suites, a lavish spa, gourmet restaurants, and more. Park Hyatt Hyderabad offers 185 stylishly designed rooms and 24 spacious suites that feature the latest in-room technology for travellers looking to retreat in the lap of luxury. Each room is opulently styled and the masterpieces of art add finesse to the décor. Park Hyatt curates city tours on request. Enjoy the heritage and the culture of the city of pearls on a tour customized and crafted by Park Hyatt Hyderabad. Witness and experience the local flavours and the unexplored parts of Hyderabad like never before, with expert guides with rich knowledge of the nooks and corners of the city yet to be discovered by many. Offer: Dine local, and enjoy thrice as many benefits! Members can now earn 3X points on enjoying a meal at The Dining Room through October 8th, 2020, when you're not staying the night. Bring a good appetite!

Relax after a busy day in our spacious and hygienic guest rooms. We are that welcoming place, where guests find uncomplicated experiences in a casual atmosphere. Experience a seamless shift from corporate to leisure at our place. Hyatt's Global Commitment to providing safe and clean environments and to upholding the highest standards of cleanliness at the hotel remains an important expression of our purpose to care for people so that they can be their best. With our safety, hygiene, and sanitization measures, your health and wellbeing are our top priorities. We are taking all necessary precautions to ensure you have a safe and comfortable stay with us. Wake up to an experience of our sumptuous breakfast available at 24/7 Gallery Café. We are also Delivering Deliciousness at your doorstep, within a 5km radius of our hotel with an all-new menu introduced on 1st June, featuring specialties from the menus of 24/7 Gallery Café and ZING- SkyBar+Lounge. name: Aditya Park, Hyderabad
description: Aditya Park Hyderabad is located in the heart of Hyderabad's commercial business district.Hotel is located right opposite to the Prime Hospital. Hussain Sagar lake is a very close tourist destination. Hotel features a gym, 2 dining options and meeting and banquet rooms with the state of the art facilities. Each room in the hotel is equipped with a LED TV, mini-bar, tea/coffee maker and a work desk. A private bathroom with toiletries is attached in all rooms. There is a business center and a tour desk in Aditya Park. Complimentary WiFi is available in the hotel. Promenade serves international cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink at Harry’s Pub. The property is 500 meters from Ameerpet Metro Station, 6 kms from Secunderabad Railway Station and 34 km from Rajiv Gandhi International Airport, with an easy access to Banjara Hills, Jubilee Hills, IT Hub and commercial industries. Ameerpet is a great choice for travelers interested in business, food, hospitals, lakes and museums.

name: Taj Mahal Hotel, Abids
description: TMH Abids is home away from home. A choice of rooms and restaurants right in the heart of the city make this hotel a preferred choice. Generations of guests have become our patrons who vouch for the signature hospitality of the Taj Mahal Hotel. Frequented by business travellers and holiday revellers alike, this resplendent property is not just aesthetically pleasing but also equipped with a world of amenities and immaculate service. One of Hyderabad’s oldest and evergreen place for vegetarian food and hospitality. TMH Abids is the place where guests head to, for breakfast, lunch or dinner. An all-day dining place that offers nothing short of a multi-cuisine experience, the three restaurants dish out appetising dishes. TMH Abids has welcomed generations of epicureans who like to indulge into a world of cuisine or who simply love to gorge on the delicious masala dosas and idly vadas. Fastidious by nature, with each passing year quality and consistency get top priority with the bar being raised with every meal made.

name: Daspalla Hotel
description: Daspalla, a Four Star Hotel in the heart of Hyderabad, Hi-tech City, better known as the Silicon Valley of the India. It is thirty minutes away from the airport is centrally and conveniently located. Daspalla is ideal for the Business, Medical Tourism and Leisure travelers. All the 110 rooms and suites are aesthetically decorated with elegant furnishings, modern fitment in a minimalist contemporary styling. Easily accessible to all major technology houses as well as the Hyderabad international convention center.The 9-level stylish building with contemporary architecture stands majestically on elevated garden space. Daspalla offers 110 luxury guest rooms comprising of six suites, 42 club select rooms, 20 premier rooms and 42 superior rooms. Rooms have a spectacular view of Hi-tech city skyline to the west and lush green landscape of Jubilee Hills to the east. Rooms are elegant, modern and above all comfortable with guest amenities like LCD TV | Satellite TV | Wireless broadband internet access | Electronic safe | Mini bar | Coffee maker.Business facilities and meeting rooms offer the ultimate comfort & convenience. Dine and entertain according to your mood or the occasion in the vibrant mix of restaurants and bars. Unwind by the pool, experience a refreshingly new and sophisticated style of living, working and relaxing in the city.

The hotel features room service. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and free breakfast, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Nagarjuna Sagar. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
If you’re looking for things to do, you can check out Nagarjunakonda, which is a popular historic site amongst tourists.
Whether you’re traveling for business, pleasure or both, Haritha Vijay Vihar Hotel is sure to make your visit to Nagarjuna Sagar one worth remembering.

For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Hyderabad, Red Fox Hotel Hyderabad is located a short distance from Shilparamam (0.6 mi) and G. M. C. Balayogi Athletic Stadium (2.1 mi). The rooms offer a flat screen TV and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available, allowing you to rest and refresh with ease. Red Fox Hotel Hyderabad features 24 hour front desk, room service, and a concierge. In addition, as a valued Red Fox Hotel Hyderabad guest, you can enjoy a fitness center and free breakfast that are available on-site. Guests arriving by vehicle have access to free parking. If you’re looking for a cafe, consider a visit to Farzi Cafe, Concu, or Link Cafe, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Red Fox Hotel Hyderabad. There is no shortage of things to do in the area: explore popular gardens such as NTR Garden, Hyderabad Botanical Gardens, and Jalagam Vengal Rao Park. The staff at Red Fox Hotel Hyderabad looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

name: Hotel Grandeur
description:
See why so many travelers make Hotel Grandeur their small hotel of choice when visiting Hyderabad. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a budget friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Hyderabad, Hotel Grandeur is located a short distance from Hyderabadmyway.com (0.7 mi) and Buddha Statue (1.3 mi).
Free wifi is offered to guests, and rooms at Hotel Grandeur offer a minibar, air conditioning, and a seating area.
During your stay, take advantage of some of the amenities offered, including room service and newspaper. Guests of Hotel Grandeur are also welcome to enjoy free breakfast, located on site. For travelers arriving by car, free parking is available.
Hyderabad has plenty of Asian restaurants. So when you’re here, be sure to check out popular spots like Barbeque Nation, Paradise Restaurant, and Our Place, which are serving up some great dishes.
If you are interested in exploring Hyderabad, check out a science museum, such as Birla Science Center.
At Hotel Grandeur, your comfort and satisfaction come first, and they look forward to welcoming you to Hyderabad.

name: Royalton Hotel
description: Royalton Hotel Hyderabad share the same characteristics, staffed by hospitality professionals who are attentive and passionate about their work, its atmosphere is warm and friendly marked by a bold and a classic style and all areas are designed for guest comfort. Located only minutes away from from business hubs and leisure spots in Hyderabad. Royalton Hotel offers 82 large and well equipped large and spacious rooms, including 8 suites. We at Royalton Hyderabad Abids also provide you with a memorable and exhilarating experience, with our best service standards and mouth watering succulent Indian and International delicacies. Additionally, the fully stocked "Scotchman bar" will feature international selection of spirits and a wide variety of fine local wines at affordable prices differentiating itself from the competition. For business travelers the hotel features a dedicated lounge for internet access and state-of-the-art facilities for meetings and conferences. The meeting rooms at the lobby level and the top floor all pillar less banquet venues also provide excellent options for private parties and themed events for up to 600 guests. Royalton Hyderabad Abids nurtures the personality that resonates with its local environment offering the guest the pleasure of discovering authentic products and services.

name: Marigold Hotel
description:
If you’re looking for a trendy hotel in Hyderabad, look no further than Marigold By Greenpark.
While staying at Marigold By Greenpark, visitors can check out Hyderabadmyway.com (0.3 mi) and Begumpet Mosque (1.1 mi), some of Hyderabad's top attractions.
Rooms at Marigold By Greenpark offer a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning providing exceptional comfort and convenience, and guests can go online with free wifi.
A rooftop terrace, a concierge, and room service are some of the conveniences offered at this hotel. A rooftop pool and free breakfast will also help to make your stay even more special. If you are driving to Marigold By Greenpark, free parking is available.
If you like Chinese restaurants, Marigold By Greenpark is conveniently located near Sri Saravana Bhavan, Rika, and Once Upon a Time.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Buddha Statue (1.1 mi), Lumbini Park (1.1 mi), and Balkampet Yellamma Temple (1.1 mi), which are some popular Hyderabad attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
The staff at Marigold By Greenpark looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.

name: The Square, Hyderabad
description: The Square Hyderabad is a four star deluxe hotel situated in the heart of the city at Greenlands Begumpet. The hotel is conveniently located - 30 kms from the Airport and 6 kms from the Railway Station, and consists of 81 rooms starting from Executive to lavish Suites and 4 Banqueting Halls and a board room accommodating 15 Pax to 800 Pax. It also consists of a 24 hr Coffee Shop, ‘The Circle,’ serving cuisine from around the world. Upcoming - an Indian Restaurant specialized with the best of India from all the states, and a state of the art health club and spa.

name: Hotel Minerva Grand
description: Hotel is beautifully designed hotel by TID Singapore, & furnished in contemporary style. This Hotel Introduced to all segments of guests more of luxury and lavish hospitality & comfort, good service & value for money Hotel provides all the services that a guest would expect out of a boutique hotel but with a difference. It has a silken touch to it. The rooms are more spacious and well catered when compared to others of the same class, the restaurants - Fiesta C'Shop & Blue Fox, are a culinary delight to all its patrons, and the facilities are top-notch with state-of-the art infrastructure It proves to be a perfect choice for corporate and leisure travelers from India and abroad because its downtown location gives easy access to key business, commercial, shopping and entertainment hubs. The hotel has extensive Banquets / Conferencinng venues, a Gym and a spa Hotel is situated 45 mins drive from the International airport and 2 kms drive from Railway Station at the heart of secunderabad
